from pylab import *
x = linspace(0, 2*pi, 1000)

p = plot(x, sin(x))

p = plot(x, sinc(x))

p = plot(x, sinc(x))

p = plot(x, sinc(x))

p = plot(x, sinc(x))

for i in range(5):
  figure()
  p = plot(x, sinc(x*i))

for i in range(5):
  figure()
  p = plot(x, sinc(x*i))

print("Verbatim output")
